DataElement.preferredName: Product Investigation Performed Observation Outcome Code Data Change Text ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information captured while conducting research on a product. EXAMPLE(S): An electrical problem in a device. A character string that is a revision of the original text observation result to enable the coding of the text. EXAMPLE(S): If the original text is "hedache", the value code modified text could be changed to "headache", so that the text can be successfully encoded.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Product Investigation Performed Observation Outcome Code Data Change Text
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The act or process of a systematic and thorough examination; research, study; the process of inquiring into or following up, intended to develop facts.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The words of something written.

Property.preferredDefinition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
